summary: Standalone horse with unique mesh and texture.
descriptionHtml:
[font="Impact"]Description:[/font]

This mod includes:
[list]
[*]Horse's mesh;
[*]Skeleton;
[*]Textures for horse (diffuse and normal maps);
[*]Saddle;
[*]Horse's and horse rider's animation (idle, walk, trot, run and sprint);
[*]HDT Hair physics for horse's tail;
[/list]

[center]
[youtube]hsOpkis8qGM[/youtube]
[/center]

[color=red][font="Impact"]Requirements:[/font][/color]

This mod requires the latest version of HDT Physics Extension .dll and SKSE.
Tested on v.14.28 of HDT.

[font="Impact"]Compatibility:[/font]

This mod [color=red]IS NOT (!)[/color] compatible with any horses saddles/armory mods!
This mod [color=green]IS[/color] compatible with Convinient Horses: you have to place this mod under CK in your's mod's order.

[font="Impact"]Installation:[/font]

Install the downloaded archive with NMM and place HDT .dll file to your Data>SKSE>Plugins folder.
There is no HDT Physics Extension .dll included in this mod, you have to download it manually, it is avalible on Nexus.

This mod includes an animation for horse and horse rider and it is not unique, i.e. it will change the animation for all Skyrim horses.
In case you don't want to use it, just delete following files in your's Skyrim folder:

[URL=http://www.radikal.ru][IMG]http://s018.radikal.ru/i511/1407/46/1168f53c9600.png[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://www.radikal.ru][IMG]http://s018.radikal.ru/i526/1407/91/1642337e2b9b.png[/IMG][/URL]

[font="Impact"]Where to find:[/font]

You may find this horse in abandoned camp not far from Morthal.
There is a dead soldier in the tent, you may read the journal of him in case you are interested in history of Bucephalus.

In case you get another horse Bucephalus will wait you on the location you leaved him.

Location:
[URL=http://www.radikal.ru][IMG]http://s018.radikal.ru/i504/1407/a5/af28e5f57464.png[/IMG][/URL]

[right][font="Impact"]Credits:[/font]

Ceruulean: for royal help in making everything connected with Creation Kit;

thesimsresource.com: for haircuts I converted for this mod;
mystikhybrid: for horse armor on which this mod's horse armor is based on;
HydrogensaysHDT: For creation physics extension plugin;
Bergzore: for the animation tutorials;
Canderes: for the physics tutorials and scripts;
necKros: for the Autopilot tool for 3ds Max;
yukl: for resources for horse animation;[/right]
author: Fuse00
